content: If you could save yourself, you'd save us all. Is that what you called me for, is that why you're knocking on my door? The time I've spent, working myself to death. Thought that's what you wanted. I thought you needed my help. To make it good again, to make us strong. To make you happy, to push you along. And gain some respect, to be thrown a crumb. I was on my knees, when you knocked me down!
author: Ween
